attributes.action: Life, liberty, and the pursuit of happiness equality Fairness And Equal Rights For All Uk Nationals In The Uk Visa Process
attributes.additional_details:
i Think Beyond All doubts Of That The Present Uk Visa System Need To Be Totally Abolished  And (Replaced)  With A Newer honest  Equal Fairer System Of Equality In The System For All Uk Citizens To Be Able   To Apply For Uk Visa
Without Decrimination  with Equal -Equality right For All To Apply For A Uk Visa  Based On There Substancial Circumstances   For Those On Low Incomes And Those Out Of Employment To Be Taken In Consideration  When They Apply For Uk Visa.s
Where To Meet The Visa Requirements
They must Provide Real Seriouse Evidence  Of A genuine Relationship Does Exist Between Them
And That She And  he Will Be Looking For Employment For A Income To Support And Not Support from The State
And Signing A Affirmation - Declaration  Swearing Of oath of What They Have Said Is True And Correct  To The Meet The Visa Requirements    To live Reside in The uk  with  There Boyfriend Girlfriend Fiance Fiancee Or there  Husband
